bug.author: mahdichtourou24051994
bug.description:
Describe the bug module 'tensorflow_model_optimization' has no attribute 'quantization' System information TensorFlow installed from (source or binary): binary TensorFlow version: 2.1.0 TensorFlow Model Optimization version: 0.2.1 Python version: colab version Describe the expected behavior import the model as described in guide Describe the current behavior not able to import the model Code to reproduce the issue import tensorflow_model_optimization as tfmot quantize_model = tfmot.quantization.keras.quantize_model
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/62559820/78595056-a4242780-7849-11ea-9069-9b4bcc6a052e.png></denchmark-link>
Additional context Add any other context about the problem here.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mahdichtourou24051994>@mahdichtourou24051994</denchmark-link> : the official 0.3.0 release that has the API is not released yet. The quantization API has not been launched yet. Please wait until <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/27880>tensorflow/tensorflow#27880</denchmark-link> is closed prior to trying it.
